fields.description: Field definitions for the integration (to be available at Administration > Integrations).

allowUserAccounts.description: Whether the integration supposes that users have their own accounts (at User > External Accounts).

userAccountAclScope.description: A scope name, a user should have access to to be able to use the integration.

view.description: A front-end view for the integration page (at Administration > Integrations).

userView.description: A front-end view for the external account page (at User > External Accounts).

params.description: Any params needed for the integration.

externalAccountSecretAttributeList.description: External account attributes to be hidden from the front-end.
